name: Arctic Escape (itch) (Ryuzac)
description:
Play as Sal the fire elemental as you escape from the cold, collect coal to keep your fire burning as your melt your way through the ice in this platformer for the Monster Mash Game Jam!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Z: Fireball, Decline
  • X:Jump, Double Jump, Accept

~ UPDATE! ~

This download is for the prototype submitted for the Monster Mash Game Jam, it's mostly playable but there's a lot of bugs, you can find updates on the game here:

http://ryuzach.tumblr.com/tagged/elemental
